sentence: The image is a collage of three different advertisements promoting personal checking accounts, targeted primarily at a Spanish-speaking audience.
sentence_cn: 该图片由三则不同的个人支票账户广告拼贴而成，主要针对讲西班牙语的受众。

sentence: Each advertisement includes images of people along with promotional text and a red color scheme.
sentence_cn: 每个广告都包含人物图像、宣传文字和红色配色方案。

sentence: - Features a man holding a young boy in an outdoor setting.
sentence_cn: - 描绘的是一名男子在户外抱着一名小男孩。

sentence: The man is smiling at the camera.
sentence_cn: 那个男人正对着镜头微笑。

sentence: - The Spanish text reads, "Ya di el primer paso para alcanzar mis metas," meaning "I took the first step toward reaching my goals."
sentence_cn: - 西班牙语文本为“Ya di el primer paso para alcanzar mis metas”，意为“我迈出了实现目标的第一步”。
words: Ya di el primer paso para alcanzar mis metas,
I took the first step toward reaching my goals.

sentence: - A red box contains text about being closer to your goals with a checking account, emphasizing personal and reliable attention and greater protection for your money.
sentence_cn: - 红色框中包含有关使用支票账户更接近您的目标的文字，强调个人和可靠的关注以及对您的资金的更大保护。

sentence: It encourages opening an account today.
sentence_cn: 它鼓励今天开设一个帐户。

sentence: - Shows a smiling woman in a casual setting with blurred background elements.
sentence_cn: - 显示一位微笑的女人在休闲环境中，背景元素模糊。

sentence: - The text states, "S¨¦ que mi dinero esta seguro," translating to "I know my money is secure."
sentence_cn: - 文字写道“S¨¦ que mi dinero esta seguro”，翻译为“我知道我的钱是安全的。”
words: S¨¦ que mi dinero esta seguro,
I know my money is secure.

sentence: - Features a red box promoting security with a checking account and invites conversation with "Hablemos" (Let's talk).
sentence_cn: - 以红色方框为特色，通过支票账户促进安全性，并邀请与“Hablemos”（让我们谈谈）进行对话。

sentence: - Depicts a young man wearing a red shirt, smiling.
sentence_cn: - 描绘的是一位身穿红色衬衫、面带微笑的年轻人。

sentence: - The text says, "Recib¨ª excelente informaci¨®n y consejos," meaning "I received excellent information and advice."
sentence_cn: - 文中写道“Recib¨ª excelente informaci¨®n y consejos”，意思是“我收到了极好的信息和建议。”
words: I received excellent information and advice.

sentence: - Includes promotional text in a red box about receiving more attention with a checking account, highlighting personal and reliable attention, and encourages opening an account today.
sentence_cn: - 在红色框中包含有关使用支票账户获得更多关注的促销文字，强调个人和可靠的关注，并鼓励立即开设账户。

sentence: Each piece of the collage repeats the campaign theme of security, personal attention, and taking proactive steps towards financial goals.
sentence_cn: 每幅拼贴画都重复了竞选主题：安全、个人关注以及积极主动地实现财务目标。
